title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Biosecurity
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Biosecurity 
Measures) Regulations 2021 (Revocation) Regulations 2022 and come into 
operation on 16 May 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (biosecurity measures) regulation 2021 (revocation) regulation 2022 come operation 16 may 2022

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Biosecurity Measures) Regulations 2021 are
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Biosecurity Measures) Regulations 2021 are 

revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 May, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th May, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [230] 3
text_norm: 2 avian influenza (biosecurity measures) regulation 2021 revoked given official seal 10 may 2022 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th may 2022 230 3

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The effect of these Regulations is to revoke the Avian Influenza (Biosecurity 
Measures) Regulations 2021 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [230]
